actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Education Reform.

official_title: To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to establish a program to identify and mentor college eligible high school students and their parents or legal guardians, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Access to Aid Act of 2001 - Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to authorize the Secretary of Education to establish a demonstration program to assist nonprofit organizations working with local school districts to establish programs that identify and mentor college-eligible students and their families.

titles.title: To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to establish a program to identify and mentor college eligible high school students and their parents or legal guardians, and for other purposes.
